task.title: Preparing the Software and Setup Utilities

context.p: The software and setup utilities are provided in the installation package, oscm-install-pack.zip. The contents of the installation package need to be made available in your environment as follows:
Extract the contents of the installation package, oscm-install-pack.zip, to a separate temporary directory on the system from where you want to install and deploy .
In the following sections, this directory is referred to as <install_pack_dir>.

After extraction, the following directories are available:
databases/bes_db
Configuration files for setting up the databases used by .
doc
PDF manuals providing installation and operation instructions, an overview of , and information on new features and compatibility issues when upgrading a installation.
domains/bes_domain
Configuration files for setting up the application server resources for the domain to which is to be deployed. The domains/bes_domain/applications subdirectory contains the archive files that make up :
oscm.ear: The platform.
oscm-portal.war: The administration portal and marketplace.
oscm-portal-help.war. The online help for the administration portal and the marketplaces.
birt.war: The report engine.
domains/indexer_domain
Configuration files for setting up the application server resources for the domain to which the search indexer application (oscm-search.ear) is to be deployed. The domains/indexer_domain/applications subdirectory contains the oscm-search.ear file.
install
XML files that support you in setting up the databases and application server resources for .
licenses
License files of third-party software used by .
oscm-operatorclient.zip: The command line tool.
context.note: The <install_pack_dir>/install directory contains a properties file, parallel-execution.properties. Do not change the content of this file!
